value.title: Beating the 1v7 INSANE AI Challenge (BEST ATTEMPT YET!) #3 - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: I challenged StarCraft 2 Pros to take on 7 Random INSANE Cheater AIs at once! Even Serral said it is impossible unless maybe they're all Zergs.
